eligibility.title: Check Your Eligibility
eligibility.description: We can only accept people onto our study if they answer Yes to the following questions.

items.description: Are you over 18 years of age?
Have you had total, or partial, knee replacement surgery, either through the NHS or a private healthcare provider, between January 2017 and December 2023?
Did you use a smartphone app or fitness tracker to track your activity before your surgery? An iPhone automatically collects activity data.
Did you use a smartphone app or fitness tracker to track your activity after your surgery? An iPhone automatically collects activity data.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description:
Before you can take part in this study, we need your consent to access activity data from your iPhone, fitness tracker or smartphone app, and your National Join Registry knee replacement surgery record.
We also need you to create an account, using an email and password, so you can log back into the PAPrKA research study portal. You may want to do this to update your personal information or if you decide to leave the study.
Your data will be managed by the PAPRKA research team and will not be shared with any other parties. You can find out more information about the way we use personal information, and the rights individuals have to control and manage their data in our [privacy policy](https://documents.manchester.ac.uk/display.aspx?DocID=37095)

requiredItems.description: I confirm that I have read the attached information sheet **(Version 2.0, Date 10/04/2024)** for the above study and have had the opportunity to consider the information and ask questions and had these answered satisfactorily.

I understand that my participation in the study is voluntary and that I am free to withdraw at any time without giving a reason and without detriment to myself.  I understand that it will not be possible to remove my data from the project once it has been anonymised and forms part of the data set.

I agree to take part on this basis.

I understand my involvement in this study involves:
- Answering an online survey and
- Allowing the PAPrKA team to:
  - access physical activity data from my fitness tracker provider.
  - access data about my knee replacement from the National Joint Registry.
  - work with the National Joint Registry to link and analyse my physical activity data, knee replacement data, and survey data to answer the PAPrKA study questions.
I give permission for the PAPrKA team to access my physical activity data stored with my fitness tracker provider to collect information for the study.

I give permission for the PAPrKA team to access my knee replacement data stored with National Joint Registry <HoverPopover innerContent="Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1 Test 1" outerContent="ℹ️" /> to collect information for the study.

I give permission for the PAPrKA team to share my identifying information (surname, date of birth, NHS number, gender and postcode) with the National Joint Registry, to allow for my knee replacement data, physical activity data and survey response to be linked.

I understand that the data linkage involves two stages:
- First, the National Joint Registry will filter out my knee replacement data and replace my identifying information with the study identification. 
- Second, the PAPrKA team will add my physical activity and survey data to the data in the first step to form the complete linked data.

I give permission for my data to be linked.
I give permission for the PAPrKA team to work with researchers at the National Joint Registry to analyse my linked data to answer the study’s research questions.
I agree that any data collected may be included in anonymous form in **publications, academic theses, dissertations, or conference presentations.**
I agree that any anonymised data collected may be made available to other researchers

I understand that my full name and email address will be passed to the University's Finance team for the sole purpose of sending me the **Amazon voucher, if I agree to take part in the prize draw and win.**

I understand that data collected during the study may be looked at by individuals from the University of Manchester or regulatory authorities, where it is relevant to my taking part in this research. I give permission for these individuals to have access to my data.
I agree to take part in this study.

optionalItems.description: I understand that the principal investigator of this study may make my physical activity data available to other researchers for future research and that this may include researchers working abroad. I give permission for these individuals to have access to my data, (but not any personal identifying information about me), I offer my physical activity data as a gift.
I agree that the PAPrKA team may retain my name and contact details to tell me about other research projects in the future.
I agree that the PAPrKA team may retain my contact details in order to provide me with a summary of the findings for this study.
